[
    EchoOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Literal(
            String(
                LiteralString {
                    value: ""<?php\n"",
                    span: Span {
                        line: 1,
                        column: 5,
                        position: 4,
                    },
                },
            ),
        ),
        ending: CloseTag(
            Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 15,
                position: 14,
            },
        ),
    },
    InlineHtml(
        "\nsome html\n",
    ),
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 3,
            column: 1,
            position: 27,
        },
    ),
    If(
        IfStatement {
            if: Span {
                line: 4,
                column: 5,
                position: 37,
            },
            condition: Parenthesized {
                left_parenthesis: Span {
                    line: 4,
                    column: 8,
                    position: 40,
                },
                inner: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span {
                                line: 4,
                                column: 9,
                                position: 41,
                            },
                            name: "$d",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                right_parenthesis: Span {
                    line: 4,
                    column: 11,
                    position: 43,
                },
            },
            body: Statement {
                statement: Block(
                    Braced {
                        left_brace: Span {
                            line: 4,
                            column: 13,
                            position: 45,
                        },
                        inner: [
                            Echo {
                                echo: Span {
                                    line: 5,
                                    column: 9,
                                    position: 55,
                                },
                                values: [
                                    Literal(
                                        String(
                                            LiteralString {
                                                value: ""// "",
                                                span: Span {
                                                    line: 5,
                                                    column: 14,
                                                    position: 60,
                                                },
                                            },
                                        ),
                                    ),
                                ],
                                ending: Semicolon(
                                    Span {
                                        line: 5,
                                        column: 19,
                                        position: 65,
                                    },
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                        right_brace: Span {
                            line: 6,
                            column: 5,
                            position: 71,
                        },
                    },
                ),
                elseifs: [],
                else: None,
            },
        },
    ),
    ClosingTag(
        Span {
            line: 7,
            column: 1,
            position: 73,
        },
    ),
    InlineHtml(
        "\n",
    ),
]
